verbs.description: Within three days of [ARG0: the Chinese government] [V: agreeing] [ARG1: to provide $ 500 million in loans to an Indonesian theme park that the Trump Organization has a deal to license President Donald Trump 's name to] , the president stunningly ordered sanctions be rescinded against a major Chinese telecom company .
